summary:
Eat The Bloody Skull, & recieve one perk point.
The skull can be crafted at the Cookpot, with one Human Skull & one piece of Horse Meat.

This mod requires Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)
Download here: http://skse.silverlock.org/

Please rate this mod, & enjoy!

This mod is also on the Steam Workshop.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/f
